item.description:
Jillian's is offering free bowling and free shoe rentals for our group from 7-9pm, we will have 4 lanes reserved for us. There is a full cash bar available and members are welcome to order their own food. This will be a great night! Be sure to bring socks with you for bowling. Please arrive on time (or a few minutes early), so we can get started quickly! There is no Sox home game occurring.

Please only sign up if you can definitely attend since this will be a popular event. If your plans change, please update your RSVP.

This event is free, but members are asked to make a $5 cash donation to Project Smile, the non profit organization helping children who are victims of traumatic events. www.projectsmile.org

We look forward to seeing you. If you have trouble finding us, call Catherine at 774 232 0000.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) on our bowling lanes. If you have trouble finding us, call 774 232 0000.
item.name: Free Bowling at Jillian's Boston
